snippet: The United States government ran a budget surplus in June, leaving the budget deficit so far this year under last year’s level.
abstract: Treasury Dept reports federal budget surplus of $51.8 billion in June, down from $70.5 billion year ago; federal government is running $313.4 billion deficit for current budget year, down 14.3 percent from deficit in year-earlier period.
lead_paragraph: The United States government ran a budget surplus in June, leaving the budget deficit so far this year under last year’s level.

headline.main: June Budget Surplus Lowers Government Deficit for Year
headline.print_headline: June Budget Surplus Lowers Government Deficit for Year
